user_review: Discovered this place by browsing through instagram food posts and decided to give it a try.And now, it seems that I can't stop ordering from them. The presentation, the quality and the pricing of the food is just outstanding. Extremely fresh fish and beautiful pieces make it feel like you're trying their food for the first time, every time.Hidden Fish has quickly become my go-to sushi place in montreal.Instagram: @sushihiddenfish
